Rad Upload

Thank you for downloading Rad Upload Lite.

The lite edition has most of the features of Rad Upload standard edition except for the fact that maximum file upload size is restricted to 512 Kilo bytes.

Rad Upload Plus has additional features including recursive folder upload and configurable upload limit.

Please visit Rad Upload on the web for more information and support.

Click Here if the applet does not start up
